title: Episode 11 (video): What Does Your Bowling Style Say About You?
description:
In this video episode we look at what your bowling style says about you and about human nature in general. And by the way, why do you keep pressing that elevator button?

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Can psychologists explain superstitions in a scientific way? Find out this week on The Psych Files.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
